programme.title: ANAK BAND - EP 54
programme.desc: Cahaya, who was trading with his vegetable cart, felt like he got a durian collapse when suddenly Gilang, the vocalist of The Junas, Cahaya's favorite band, ran up to Cahaya asking for help so that Cahaya helped him avoid the pursuit of his fans. Light, who was kind and always optimistic, happily helped Gilang hide. Once safe, Gilang came out of hiding and thanked Light. Light was very happy because it turned out that Gilang was very friendly.

programme.title: My Dosen is My Husband
programme.desc: Gita must agree to marry Fajar because they were caught by the neighborhood security guard doing something indecent. Unexpectedly, Fajar turned out to be a lecturer at the university where Gita studies. How will the story of Fajar and Gita continue?

programme.title: Samudra Cinta - EP 392
programme.desc: The love story between Ocean and Cinta, which had always quarreled before. Gradually, they became friends and slowly grew in love between them. programme.title: Love Story The Series S2 - EP 66

programme.desc: Simran, who relocates to Seoul, is distraught when Daya, a gangster, re-enters her life. She has to make a choice between him and her lover Akash, who is a singer at an Indian restaurant. Release Year: 2006 Director: Anurag Basu

programme.title: Karma
programme.desc: A jailer recruits three prisoners to help him wipe out a terrorist. Will he succeed? Release Year: 1986 Director: Subhash Ghai

programme.desc: A young man renowned for his martial arts skills sees his life take a dramatic turn when a secret government agency recruits him for a dangerous mission to thwart the plans of a group of terrorists.

programme.title: Heyy Baby
programme.desc: Three men living in Australia are surprised to find a baby on their doorstep. They do not know who the father is and start a frantic search for the woman who could possibly be the mother.

programme.title: Nela Ticket
programme.desc: Nela Ticket, an orphan, is raised by Ananda Bhoopati, who is later killed by his own son, Aditya. However, things turn ugly after Nela Ticket and Aditya come face-to-face.

programme.title: LAKSHMI
programme.desc: Maha, her family’s financial backbone, marries Selvam, on condition that she will continue to support her family financially even after marriage. Post which they confront challenges that put the family’s peace and happiness to test.

programme.title: Punitha

programme.title: MANAMAGALE VAA

programme.title: LAKSHMI

programme.title: Tempete
programme.desc: Zoe grows up on a stud farm and her only dream is to become a jockey. Her mare Tempete is her best friend. But they have an accident one stormy evening. Zoe is left paraplegic. She clings on for years and tries to achieve the impossible of fulfilling her destiny.

programme.title: Au-Dela Des Murs
programme.desc: One morning, Lina is getting ready to go to Baumettes prison to attend her first visit. Nadjim, her boyfriend, has recently been imprisoned. Before leaving, she gathers things to take to him.

programme.title: Cerebrum - EP 3
programme.desc: Suspicion falls on the brother of one of Henri's former patients, who had threatened him. Marine and William are finding it increasingly hard to cope with their mother's disappearance. Simone and Danno step up their efforts in an investigation they'd expected to be simple, but so far they're getting nowhere.

programme.title: Cerebrum - EP 4
programme.desc: Despite his grief Henri manages to keep going. Firstly with his son William, who's starting to worry him, and with his patients who need him. But Henri is still wary about revealing the identity of his patients, notably those he has doubts about, claiming a duty of professional secrecy.

programme.title: Le Grand Jt Des Territoires - EP 35
programme.desc: Contents: Asian hornets are on the increase and worrying beekeepers; Lake Geneva is polluted by 100 tonnes of plastic a year; town centre rangers to preserve the quality of life; how paper is recycled...

And the artists, already well-known faces, who became regular partners for his nocturnal escapades...

programme.title: Kididoc - EP 51
programme.desc: Kidi, a kind-hearted artificial intelligence, guides Pomme and Fix on their journey through Kidi-World. From dinosaurs to the Chateau de Versailles, the human body to the history of aviation: Kidi-World is not only an adventure-filled wonderland but also, and above all, a means of finding the answer to every question.

programme.title: Bande De Sportifs ! - EP 37
programme.desc: The intrepid journalist, Theo, goes out to meet young athletes to get an introduction to their disciplines. Each sport has its own unique rules, equipment and history.

programme.desc: Braillard, Colombe and Lablatte have discovered a way of travelling back through ancient eras and civilisations. programme.desc: It's nearly time for the winter festival. Pompon learns to skate on the frozen lake and prepares his present for Rita: a superb pair of skates. But the next day the lake ice has melted! Catastrophe, Pompon's surprise is worthless... There's only one solution, to summon the spirit of winter.

programme.title: Mourir D'aimer
programme.desc: In May 1968, 32 year-old Daniele is passionate and politically-committed young woman. But when she begins a relationship with Gerard, her 17 year-old student, the affair rapidly becomes a scandal. The teenager's parents bring charges against her for corrupting a minor. Daniele is sent to prison...

programme.title: Voir Le Soleil Se Lever Dans La Lune
programme.desc: At the end of his life, Victor Hugo goes to see the ocean one last time and confronts his ghosts. A poetic and dreamlike film, inspired by ''Les Contemplations''.

programme.title: Wilder - EP 3
programme.desc: Dani Räber isn't giving into Strunz's blackmail: the documents have no importance. Will the criminal fall into the trap? Suspected of murder, Zingg is set free but Kägi is watching him. Rosa Wilder hopes that her sick father will agree to undergo a treatment which could save his life.

programme.title: Wilder - EP 4
programme.desc: The party organised by the Räbers to celebrate the end of the dam project is overshadowed by a tragic accident. Kägi asks Rosa to help him with his investigation. Strunz, who needs money in a hurry, prepares a kidnapping.

programme.title: Le Crime Lui Va Si Bien - EP 5
programme.desc: Investigating the death of a young girl found in a refrigerated lorry, Gaby is suspended for participating in a protest by small farmers. Making the most of this enforced time off work, she takes a job at a supermarket, convinced that this is where the truth behind the case lies.

programme.title: Version Francaise - EP 7
programme.desc: The Musee des Beaux-Arts du Perigord offers a rich and varied selection of works. In his studio, Tuan Tran combines the finesse of glass with the brutality of concrete. At Schiaparelli, masculine and feminine are confidently combined. Dive behind the scenes of D'Offard wallpaper production.

Jean-Marie heard ''Mon dos'', by emile Proulx-Cloutier, and immediately understood that he was suffering from a professional burn out.

programme.title: Nos Terres Gourmandes - EP 39
programme.desc: Exceptional walk in the heart of Beaujolais, on the heights of Mont Brouilly. An iconic territory where the vineyard comes alive every year for the great Beaujolais Nouveau celebration in mid-November.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete on arrow-word grids that they try to fill in by finding the answers to the given clues. But to access the clues, they must first answer questions with a very particular characteristic: the answer is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Louis Et La Faune Urbaine - EP 4
programme.desc: Louis discovers a family of racoons living inside the ceiling space of a house. The young are now over five weeks old and very aggressive.

programme.title: Les Belges Du Bout Du Monde - EP 12
programme.desc: Amandine Pekel, a young diplomat, traveled extensively before stopping in Sweden, where she continues to forge links between Wallonia and Scandinavia. With her, Adrien discovers an unknown aspect of the country and a common history dating back to 1624 with Louis de Geer.

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'est Dans La Boite ! - EP 4
programme.desc: Each day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box in the studio. But what's inside? One thing is certain, it's bound to contain a surprise that will lead them to discover a host of very different subjects: from guitars to trolls and even how to sort your waste for recycling!

programme.title: Kididoc - EP 52
programme.desc: Kidi, a kind-hearted artificial intelligence, guides Pomme and Fix on their journey through Kidi-World. From dinosaurs to the Chateau de Versailles, the human body to the history of aviation: Kidi-World is not only an adventure-filled wonderland but also, and above all, a means of finding the answer to every question.

programme.title: Bande De Sportifs ! - EP 39
programme.desc: The intrepid journalist, Theo, goes out to meet young athletes to get an introduction to their disciplines. Each sport has its own unique rules, equipment and history.

programme.title: Bande De Sportifs ! - EP 40
programme.desc: The intrepid journalist, Theo, goes out to meet young athletes to get an introduction to their disciplines. Each sport has its own unique rules, equipment and history.

programme.title: 1001 Mondes Antiques - EP 19
programme.desc: Braillard, Colombe and Lablatte have discovered a way of travelling back through ancient eras and civilisations. They embark on a journey back in time, passing through popular civilisations such as ancient Egypt and Greece, as well as sub-Saharan Africa, the Middle East and Mesopotamia.

programme.title: 1001 Mondes Antiques - EP 20
programme.desc: Braillard, Colombe and Lablatte have discovered a way of travelling back through ancient eras and civilisations. They embark on a journey back in time, passing through popular civilisations such as ancient Egypt and Greece, as well as sub-Saharan Africa, the Middle East and Mesopotamia.

programme.title: Louise Et La Legende Du Serpent A Plumes
programme.desc: 9 year-old Louise has just moved to Mexico with her family, and she's finding it difficult to settle in. Fortunately, her beloved lizard, Keza, is on hand to comfort her. One day he escapes leading Louise through a myriad of incredible adventures as she discovers Mexico and its inhabitants.

programme.title: Nos Terres Gourmandes - EP 39
programme.desc: Exceptional walk in the heart of Beaujolais, on the heights of Mont Brouilly. An iconic territory where the vineyard comes alive every year for the great Beaujolais Nouveau celebration in mid-November.

programme.title: Bleu Ocean - EP 5
programme.desc: Fishing in Polynesia has always been rooted in Polynesians' souls... But some traditions are vanishing. In Bora Bora, Papi Paoa, a lifelong fisherman, is the sole bearer of certain ancestral techniques.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Silence, Ca Pousse ! - EP 26
programme.desc: Programme summary: sisters in indigo; green cement; the Santa Cruz garden; ''Don't panic'' visits Martine.

programme.title: TV5 Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Le Vent Des Sables
programme.desc: In Sables-d'Olonne, everything is ready for the start of the Vendee Globe. While the sailors in the race are getting ready to set sail, the murder of a local figure disrupts the preparations. The victim was the sponsor of one of the participants, Yannick Berthome. Lieutenants Kamara and Finet take charge of the investigation.

programme.title: Au Bonheur Des Livres - EP 7
programme.desc: Around a chosen theme, Claire Chazal welcomes two authors: novelists, biographers, essayists or historians, and shares viewers' literary favorites.

programme.title: Thomas Pesquet : Objectif France
programme.desc: From space, with astronaut Thomas Pesquet, but also thanks to satellite images of Earth, we embark on an odyssey through the very heart of France and its natural landscapes. An opportunity for a different view of the country and its overseas territories, so small when seen on a global scale.

programme.title: Movie - Villan
programme.desc: Shiva, a bus conductor, robs from the corrupt in order to fund an organisation that aids the disabled. He also pretends to be his own disabled twin in order to avoid detection and trial.

programme.title: Movie - Thangam
programme.desc: Thangam, a landlord, dearly loves his sister. When Arusamy rapes his sister, Thangam is forced to let him marry her. When his sister is killed despite all his sacrifices, he vows to avenge her death.

programme.title: Movie - Oru Puthiya Kathai
programme.desc: Oru Pudhiya Kadhai is a 1990 Indian Tamil-language romantic drama film directed by R. Balasubbiah, starring Prabhuraj and Meena.

programme.title: Movie - Othikai
programme.desc: At various Indian tourist spots, especially hill stations, numerous lovers end their lives for love, but some lovers are being killed. The movie deals with this subject with a mix of thriller, action and romance.

programme.title: Fillers
programme.desc: KTV HD presents you round-the-clock Kollywood movies, from the latest blockbusters to classics of the yesteryear!

programme.title: Movie - Subash
programme.desc: In order to marry the girl he loves, Subash, a good-for-nothing youth, joins the army. When he returns, he learns that his own brother is using corrupt ways to gain power in politics.

programme.title: Movie - Neethiyin Marupakkam
programme.desc: Vijayakumar falls in love with the zamindar's daughter and the two decide to marry. However, things turn sour when the zamindar kills his brother and mother, compelling him to seek revenge.

programme.title: Movie - Solla Marandha Kadhai
programme.desc: Sivadhanu, an educated but unemployed honest man, gets married to the daughter of a rich man and moves to their house. However, taunts and disrespect compel him to find a new job in another town.

programme.title: Movie - Thulli Thirintha Kaalam
programme.desc: Khushboo faces several difficulties when she tries to discipline a group of youngsters who are idlers and always cause huge embarrassment to their families.

programme.title: Movie - Kidari
programme.desc: Kombaiah Pandiayan, a big shot in his village, is stabbed by one of his enemies. Following this, his loyal servant Kidaari sets out to find the culprit.

programme.title: Movie - Varushamellam Vasantham
programme.desc: Raja's grandfather constantly berates him for being uneducated and jobless. Meanwhile the old man's other grandson, Ramesh, has a good job. Trouble follows when both try to woo the same girl.

programme.title: Movie - Pani Thuli
programme.desc: To prove his love for Archana, Shiva distances himself from her for a year due to a condition put forth to him by Archana's father. But during the year, he meets Maya and falls in love with her.

programme.title: Movie - Paruvathin Vasalile
programme.desc: Thyagu is fond of her elder sister's daughter Geetha, who meets Saravanan and helps him find a job in her company. However, Thyagu is shocked to learn about Geetha and Saravanan.

programme.title: Fillers
programme.desc: KTV HD presents you round-the-clock Kollywood movies, from the latest blockbusters to classics of the yesteryear!

programme.title: Movie - One Two Three
programme.desc: Three men with physical impairments lead rather dull and monotonous lives. However, when a young woman befriends them, it brings about many positive changes in them.

programme.title: Movie - Urimai Unjal Aadukirathu
programme.desc: Shanmugam lives with his wife Vadivu and three children Uma, Mala and Narayanan. Shanmugam has great respect for his elder brother Sundarrajan, a widower. A small flashback is shown where Sundarrajan's wife dies during childbirth.

programme.title: Movie - Kovai Brothers
programme.desc: Friends Ganesh and Vasanth come to Chennai to find the killers of Ganesh's sister and seek revenge. They take up a job at a television channel to accomplish their mission.

programme.title: Movie - Sabash
programme.desc: Cheenu, a blind man, and his friend Dharan discover the body of Cheenu's wife Shanti. Initially, the police regard it as a suicide. However, evidence soon surfaces, suggesting foul play.

programme.title: Movie - Paayum Puli (New)
programme.desc: When an extortion gang spreads terror in Madurai, ACP Jayasheelan is assigned to bring an end to their wrongdoing. However, he is unaware that the mastermind of the crimes is someone close to him.

programme.title: MATCH OFFICIALS MIC'D UP - TUES 02 SEP
programme.desc: Join PGMOL Chief Refereeing Officer Howard Webb and former Premier League star Michael Owen, as they use previously un-released audio from the on-field officials and VAR teams to explain refereeing decisions. This ground-breaking broadcast will feature the in-game audio of selected incidents from the 2025/26 season.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 4
programme.desc: We sit down with ex-Premier League referee Howard Webb, to talk about his early days as a South Yorkshire policeman to becoming one of the most respected referees in world football. In this candid interview Webb shares stories of his rise through the Premier League ranks, culminating in the honour of refereeing the 2010 FIFA World Cup Final. Along the way, he shares the challenges, pressures, and defining moments of a career spent making the game's toughest calls on the biggest stages.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 13
programme.desc: We catch up with Christian Benteke in Washington, where the powerful Belgian striker now leads the line for D.C. United. From his early days in Belgium to his explosive arrival in the Premier League with Aston Villa, followed by big moves to Liverpool and Crystal Palace, Benteke's journey has been one of raw talent, resilience, and reinvention.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 10
programme.desc: We delve into the remarkable journey of Sunderland AFC; a club defined by its dramatic highs and painful lows. From their proud top-flight legacy to the heartbreak of consecutive relegations, Sunderland's story is one of resilience, identity, and unbreakable community spirit. Now, under the leadership of new head coach Regis Le Bris, the Black Cats are preparing for a new chapter.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 12
programme.desc: We follow the remarkable journey of Olivier Giroud, from his Premier League days with Arsenal and Chelsea to Champions League glory and beyond. A World Cup winner known for his elegance and resilience, Giroud's career has taken him from London to Milan, then to LA, and now back home with a move to Lille. As he begins this new chapter, we reflect on the highs, the hurdles, and the legacy of one of football's most underrated and enduring strikers.

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW - EP 3
programme.desc: Born in Lodi, raised in Brescia and Milan, home now on Tyneside, Sandro Tonali has established himself as an influential part of Eddie Howe's Newcastle side since his statement transfer from boyhood club AC Milan in 2023. In this week's Big Interview, the Toon's number eight reflects on his triumphs and tribulations, including helping the Rossoneri to a first Scudetto in 11 years and adapting to life on and off the pitch in the North-East of England.

programme.title: REVIEW OF THE SEASON - 2024/2025 (LIV)
programme.desc: Relive another extraordinary Premier League campaign as Liverpool soared to an historic 20th league title, Nottingham Forest defied expectations and the promoted sides were strenuously challenged. There were also tactical transformations, shifts in narrative trends, and a more open field than ever before. Review of the Season documents all of the thrilling stories to emerge across the 380 matches.

programme.title: Nottingham Forest vs West Ham United (MW03) - EP 29
programme.desc: West Ham United haven’t scored in any of their last four Premier League visits to the City Ground (D1 L3) - the last Hammers player to score there was Michael Hughes in September 1996.

programme.title: Aston Villa vs Crystal Palace (MW03) - EP 21
programme.desc: Crystal Palace won 4-1 in their last meeting with Aston Villa in February, last winning consecutive league games against them in the 2013-14 campaign.

programme.title: WCCB Otto Wallin vs. Gianluca Mandras
programme.desc: Italian champ Gianluca Mandras (12-4, 5 KOs) battles 26-year-old Swedish southpaw Otto Wallin (17-0, 11 KOs) for the WBA Continental Heavyweight Championship in Wallin's hometown of Sundsvall in the city's premiere professional boxing event. Wallin expects to seize the title, while Mandras plans to spoil Wallin's homecoming celebration at the Sporthallen arena.

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode we see the best Judo from the Abu Dhabi Grand Slam on world Judo day, we speak to double world champion Mayra Aguiar about the unity of the Brazilian judo team, and watch as two world champions battle for gold in the -57kg division.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Dmitry Priog vs. Daniel Jacobs

programme.title: WCCB Canelo Alvarez vs. Caleb Plant
programme.desc: The Undisputed Super Middleweight World Championship is on the line as Canelo Alvarez defends his WBA, WBC, and WBO Super Middleweight World Championship titles against Caleb Plant, while attempting to claim the IBF World Title to become Undisputed Champion. Canelo has not lost a fight since a decision loss to Floyd Mayweather over seven years prior, including a recent stoppage victory over Billy Joe Saunders to win the WBO Title.

programme.title: Greatest Classics Lennox Lewis vs. Mike Dixon
programme.desc: FIGHT SPORTS presents another exciting Greatest Classics episode, bringing you more action featuring the greatest fighters in boxing history. Twenty fights into his professional career, highly touted Olympic Gold Medalist Lennox Lewis was taking the steps towards claiming his first World Championship. He had knocked out nearly all of his opponents to this point, and a showdown with nemesis "Razor" Ruddock was just a few months away.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Jhonny Gonzalez vs Gerry Penalosa
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Jhonny Gonzalez defending the WBO bantamweight title against Gerry Penalosa. A left hook to the body ends the fight. Also on the card, a controversial ending to the Nate Campbell / Ali Funeka brawl.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Episode 2 from Fukuoka, Japan.

programme.title: Karate 1 Premier League
programme.desc: Rabat, Morocco welcomes one of the most anticipated events in Martial Arts this year as the Karate 1 Premier League returns. The last edition of Karate 1 Premier League in Rabat saw nearly 200 athletes from 44 countries participating in this event, one of the most prestigious in the world of Karate. The World Karate Federation expects another tremendous turnout, featuring Olympic medalists and world-ranked competitors, when the Karate 1 Premier League is back in Rabat, Morocco.

programme.title: MMA:30
programme.desc: This episode features a look at rising star Ryan "Darth" Bader. We go over BMX bike jumps with heavyweight Roy "Big Country" Nelson. And MMA:30 takes you inside the training camp of stud wrestler Phil Davis and we take a look at Bellator's duel promotional event Dynamite.

programme.title: WCCB Canelo Alvarez vs. Jermell Charlo
programme.desc: One of the most anticipated fights in boxing takes place at the T-Mobile Arena in Las Vegas as two Undisputed World Champions meet -unified Super Middleweight titleholder, Canelo Alvarez, defending against Junior Middleweight champ Jermell Charlo. Canelo has established himself as one of boxing's best fighters, winning World Titles in four different weight classes on his way to becoming boxing's biggest star.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Arturo Gatti vs. Alfonso Gomez
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Arturo Gatti facing off with Alfonso Gomez in what would be Gatti's final boxing match. Also on the card, Andre Berto takes on veteran Carlos Quintana on his way to stardom.

programme.title: XMA

programme.title: Pariah: Sonny Liston
programme.desc: Was Sonny Liston murdered? This four-part documentary series explores the life and untimely death of boxing legend Charles 'Sonny' Liston, who became the heavyweight champion of the world when he knocked out Floyd Patterson in 1962. Unfortunately, just eight years later, he was found dead in his Las Vegas home from an alleged heroin overdose. Suspicion regarding the real cause of his death has continued to this day. Episode 1 of 4.

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) - EP 101
programme.desc: The Teletubbies bottom bounce on The Tubby Bouncy before wiggling their bottoms to a special bottom bump song.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S3) - EP 1
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say 'cake' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure.

programme.title: Pop Paper City (S1) - EP 8
programme.desc: It's Pop Paper City Sports Day and Mae-Mae is the Sports Day judge, but can she decide on the right winner?

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO (S2) - EP 1
programme.desc: When the OKIDO lighthouse breaks down, Messy, Felix, Zoe and Zoom travel to Mystery Mountain in search of a light that never goes out.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 22
programme.desc: Bluey promises her customer, Bingo, the best tour ever in a game of Whale Watching, but they need Mum and Dad to join in, and they are too tired to play after a late night.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 21
programme.desc: Tired of being told what to do, Bluey and Bingo enlist their giant invisible friend Tina to show Mum and Dad who's boss. Now they can do anything they want, until Mum and Dad rebel.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 1
programme.desc: The Squirrels are admiring Duggee's crop of giant carrots when they hear a noise. They find the Rabbits busy preparing for the Carrot Solstice.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 10
programme.desc: Roly needs a wee, but the door is locked and Duggee has mislaid the key. Not to worry, Duggee has his metal detector.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 7
programme.desc: Betty recalls the first time she pushed the red button, the Squirrels explore a range of emotions with Happy, Angry Bull tells a not-so-sleepy bedtime story, and the gerbils sing.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 8
programme.desc: Spring has sprung! There are cute baby animals to meet and frolic with.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) - EP 37
programme.desc: The Go Jetters travel to Kinderdijk in The Netherlands to celebrate National Mill Day.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 33
programme.desc: When Dad has to stop having fun with the girls and go to work, Bluey and Bingo scramble to keep him playing games with them on the trampoline!

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 32
programme.desc: Bingo is sick in hospital, so Bluey and Dad sent her a homemade video to lift her spirits. It tells the tale of Barnicus' quest to heal her spotty dog named Bumpy.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animal Missions (S1) - EP 15
programme.desc: In this episode, Andy, Jen and Scout head to Alaska, America on a baby animal mission to help rescue some black bear cubs high up in a tree. Along the way, Andy meets a grumpy Arctic ground squirrel.

programme.title: Dog Squad (S2) - EP 1
programme.desc: It's puppy cadet training day, when pups all over Woofton see if they've got what it takes to become an assistance dog.

programme.title: Aneeshwar and Lizzie Go Wild (S2) - EP 1
programme.desc: Aneeshwar and Lizzie head out to meet lions. From their safari truck, they get right in amongst the pride and see big maned males as well as a large group of females. Their next animal is Rico, a two-toed sloth.

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S7) - EP 5
programme.desc: Sandy and Seaweed have invented a new game knocking down bottles with coconuts; they have called it 'Bowling'.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 35
programme.desc: The Squirrels are having fun playing a song they made, but they wish that they could see themselves perform. Duggee has a great suggestion, and they learn how to be creative.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 34

programme.desc: The Squirrels are looking for Duggee but can't find him. Instead, they find someone who looks like Enid, only much too big. Duggee has painted his face to look like Enid!

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 9
programme.desc: Spot the odd one out or guess who lives here. A great memory tip from Duggee, an edition of The Agony and Eggstacy, and how to draw Enid - down to her last whisker.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 10
programme.desc: Today at Squirrel Club, there are all sorts of comparisons to learn - from small to smallest, hungry to hungriest, and Duggee to Duggiest!

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) - EP 39
programme.desc: The Go Jetters are at Centre Court in Wimbledon to watch the world's most famous tennis tournament.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 35
programme.desc: Bluey's backyard zoo is home to wonderful animals, especially the big blue Daddy gorilla. But when he grabs visitor Bingo and escapes, Zookeeper Bluey must recapture the wild beast.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 34
programme.desc: On a trip to the Dump, Dad claims he's the best at everything. But Bluey discovers that Dad's throwing out her old drawing and questions if he really is the best Dad in the world.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animal Missions (S1) - EP 2
programme.desc: Andy encounters some baby Lar Gibbons in Thailand that appear to be flying as they swing through the rainforest.

programme.title: Dog Squad (S2) - EP 3

programme.title: Aneeshwar and Lizzie Go Wild (S2) - EP 3

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S7) - EP 7
programme.desc: Captain Captain discovers that Sandy and Seaweed don't know any of the correct names for the parts of the ship, so she decides to teach them through a song!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 37

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 36

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 35

programme.desc: The team race to save Glitch when his kite flies too close to the academy's windfarm.

Without it, the sewer’s water levels will rise, threatening to overflow and flood the whole city! It’s going to take a heist to extract the pearl from its display at a local museum, before it’s too late.

They'll have to raft the Amazon and brave Odlulu's ""living"" plants to complete their mission

programme.title: Millennial Money
programme.desc: Putting the "personal" in personal finance, get an inside look at the lives and finances of millennials. See exactly how much they earn, what they spend it on and how they invest. From starting a business to changing careers, getting in and out of debt, creating an unusual income stream, or casting it all aside to start over again... young people reveal the steps they took to make it happen.

programme.desc: The China Connection delivers in-depth analysis of China’s economy, markets and its relationship with the global landscape. Emily Chan brings you expert insights, exclusive interviews, covering key sectors, trade developments and policy shifts.

programme.title: Access Middle East
programme.desc: Access Middle East is your window into Middle East power, money, and influence. With exclusive interviews and high-level analysis, the program brings viewers closer to the decision-makers deploying capital and driving innovation in one of the world’s most dynamic regions.

programme.title: Europe Early Edition
programme.desc: Start your trading day with Europe Early Edition as major European financial centres take the reins of global markets. Get the first indication of how markets in Europe will react to an active Asian session and the handover from the US. With breaking news, key earnings and data, as well as interviews with market makers and C-Suite executives from across the globe, Europe Early Edition is essential viewing to be prepared for the day’s session.

programme.title: Squawk Box Europe
programme.desc: It’s one hour until the opening bell in Europe and Squawk Box Europe has everything you need to prepare for the first trade. Steve Sedgwick, Karen Tso and Julianna Tatelbaum take on the most complex stories of the day with instant analysis on how you can make your money work around the news.

programme.title: Us Worldwide Exchange
programme.desc: Broadcast from CNBC Global Headquarters in Englewood Cliffs, N.J., CNBC’s "Worldwide Exchange" delivers essential, actionable information and analysis for anyone who wants to be part of the global business conversation. Anchored by Frank Holland, the program prepares CNBC’s worldwide audience with a smart take on overnight U.S. news and live international market action.

programme.title: Us Squawk Box
programme.desc: "Squawk Box" is the ultimate pre-market morning news and talk program, where the biggest names in business and politics tell their most important stories. Anchored by Joe Kernen, Becky Quick and Andrew Ross Sorkin, the show brings Wall Street to Main Street. It's a must-see for everyone from the professional trader to the casual investor.

programme.title: Us Squawk On The Street
programme.desc: Headquartered live on the floor of the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) where the biggest companies in the world trade, "Squawk On The Street" tracks the action of every stock and gives you access to the treasury, currency and commodity action in real time. The show also covers the final hour of European trading, providing investors with actionable insight on the best course of action to take in U.S. based markets.

programme.title: Us Money Movers
programme.desc: "Money Movers" provides investors with real-time analysis of the stories and the people attracting the attention of the markets each day. Capturing the energy of day’s early trading, the program includes the breaking news and numbers driving stocks and sectors, helping investors make critical decisions. "Money Movers" anchors speak with the CEOs, government decision-makers and newsmakers who play a relevant role in how money is moving.

programme.title: Us Halftime Report
programme.desc: Halftime Report is on the front lines of CNBC's market coverage. Host CNBC’s Scott Wapner and the Street's top investors get to the heart of the action as it's happening and help set the agenda for the rest of the day.

programme.title: Us The Exchange

programme.title: The Circuit with Emily Chang S3 - EP 8
programme.desc: Meghan, the Duchess of Sussex, opens up in a wide-ranging interview with Emily Chang about life beyond the royal spotlight and her latest ventures in business and entertainment.

programme.title: The Future with Hannah Fry S2 - EP 1
programme.desc: Artificial intelligence has begun to exhibit early signs of agency. Are we on a path to superintelligence? Self destruction? Or is the potential promise and threat of AI being overblown?

programme.title: The Future with Hannah Fry S2 - EP 2
programme.desc: Bioacoustics technology and AI are revealing how animals communicate, and may soon allow us to talk to them ourselves. What can we learn from wildlife? And should we be talking to the animals at all?

programme.title: The Future with Hannah Fry S2 - EP 3
programme.desc: With the promise of unimaginable computing power, a global race for quantum supremacy is raging. Who will be first to harness this new technological force, and what will they do with it?

programme.title: The Future with Hannah Fry S2 - EP 4
programme.desc: Water. Our survival depends on water, yet global reserves are rapidly shrinking. Can technology help secure humanity's future water needs?

programme.title: The Future with Hannah Fry S2 - EP 5
programme.desc: For some, pain is excruciating and inescapable. But amid the continuing fallout of the opioid crisis, new technologies are being developed to limit and even eliminate pain.

programme.title: The Future with Hannah Fry S2 - EP 6
programme.desc: Soon, another billion people will be online. How will these new users embrace this technology to transform their lives, and what will it mean for the rest of the world?

programme.title: Momentum S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: Haslinda Amin reveals the burgeoning role of India's private space firms and their recent advances. Leaders and innovators divulge how they are pushing the boundaries of space.

programme.title: Momentum S1 - EP 2
programme.desc: Amid Seoul's pulsating energy, Haslinda Amin reveals an architectural renaissance that's reshaping the city, blending tradition with innovation while providing the world a new wave to follow.

programme.title: Momentum S1 - EP 3
programme.desc: Haslinda Amin explores the way robots and AI are integrated into Japanese life. From drones managing crops to unmanned harvesters, see how it's paving the way to a more efficient future.

programme.title: Momentum S1 - EP 4
programme.desc: South Korea is emerging as a pivotal force in reshaping maritime transportation, leading the way to a future with autonomous ships and more eco-friendly propulsion systems.

programme.title: Momentum S1 - EP 5
programme.desc: Singapore has transformed itself from a colonial outpost into a thriving metropolis boasting unparalleled infrastructure, seamless transportation and accessible housing.

programme.title: Momentum S1 - EP 6
programme.desc: Japan is seeing a renaissance in its chip industry. Spearheaded by giants and startups alike, what lessons are there for the world as this digital transformation takes shape?

programme.title: The Deal with Alex Rodriguez and Jason Kelly S3 - EP 6
programme.desc: The hosts sit with David Blitzer, co-founder of Harris Blitzer Sports & Entertainment, to discuss how his teams use data and analytics to improve the fan experience.

programme.title: The Deal with Alex Rodriguez and Jason Kelly S3 - EP 7
programme.desc: The hosts sit for a special conversation with two titans, football coach Bill Belichick and Bridgewater founder Ray Dalio, to learn their guiding principles for success.

programme.title: Power Players S2 - EP 1
programme.desc: Major League Baseball Hall of Famer Cal Ripken Jr. and his brother Bill have turned youth sports into big business. But can they chase profits while preserving what's best for kids?

programme.title: Power Players S2 - EP 3
programme.desc: Toronto Raptors President Masai Ujiri leads the only non-US team in the National Basketball Association, and he's spearheading an effort to take the game global.

programme.title: Power Players S2 - EP 3
programme.desc: Shahid Khan owns two teams, one in the National Football League and the other in the English Premier League. He's got an ambitious playbook to boost both kinds of football around the world.

programme.title: Power Players
programme.desc: National Women's Soccer League Commissioner Jessica Berman is presiding over a pivotal moment for women's soccer. Can she help turn astronomical growth into a sustained business?

programme.title: Global Business
programme.desc: The flagship business program of CGTN’s English language service. The program offers in-depth analysis of the latest economic data, business trends and market moving policies, zooming in on how all this affects ordinary people. With separate editions out of Asia, Europe, Africa and the Americas, Global Business features analysts and news-makers supported through a global network of correspondents. Global Business shows you what's moving markets in both developed and emerging economies.

programme.title: Africa Live
programme.desc: Africa Live is a news program that focuses on African issues and issues related to this diverse continent. CGTN’s Nairobi-based broadcast center produces Africa Live. programme.title: World Insight with Tian Wei
programme.desc: World Insight with Tian Wei is a long-running international platform for debate and intelligent discussion. Live debates linking movers and shakers take place in the signature segment "Global Debate".

programme.title: Dialogue
programme.desc: Dialogue is a prime time daily English talk show on CGTN. programme.title: Girl Power - EP 516
programme.desc: Invite stylish men from all over the world to share cultural differences, feelings and values, and life experiences with Taiwanese!

programme.title: Hello Doctor - EP 1499
programme.desc: The program invites doctors from different fields to talk about big and small things about doctors, break the stereotype of doctors and provide audiences with information on medical health from a relaxed and pleasant perspective!

programme.title: The Queen Show - EP 27
programme.desc: Sharp Queen Li Jing and Absurd Master Shen Yulin

programme.title: Dee Girl's Talk - EP 332
programme.desc: Hosted by Dee Hsu, the most queenly artist in the entertainment industry, and partnered with the humorous assistant host Patrick, each episode invites many of the most popular and topical artists and Internet celebrities to appear on the show. Through Dee Hsu Her profound and spicy hosting skills stirred up unparalleled "laughter" with the guests.

programme.title: No.57 Dream Boulevard - EP 1780
programme.desc: More professional, richer, and more diversified car model information is shared with the audience.

programme.title: ShinyFoodDiary - EP 17
programme.desc: The host visits various places in a walking and themed way, focusing on what is most fashionable among young people nowadays.Check in on FB and IG to create new highlights and online clicks, not only delicious food, but also in-depth introduction.Introduce the cultural customs and festivals of various places.

programme.title: All Star Quiz Show - EP 1102
programme.desc: The puzzle reality program, with the curator Sam Tseng as the knowledge gatekeeper, tests every artist star who comes to challenge the Jiugongge puzzle game. If you want to conquer the Jiugongge level, through creative association, logical reasoning, and rational analysis, you will have the opportunity to obtain wisdom stars and take away the dream prize.

programme.title: Big Boys Club
programme.desc: Each episode of Big Boys Club invites singers, artistes as well as people from different walks of life as guests onto the show, participating in relaxed interviews and discussing current trends.

programme.title: Deep in the Realm of Conscience - EP 5
programme.desc: Set during the Tang dynasty, drama follows Prince of Ping, Princess Taiping, and their confidants as they vie for control of the imperial court, exposing layers of jealousy, betrayal and ambition amid the backdrop of court intrigue.

programme.title: Heroes In White & What's On Today - EP 1
programme.desc: A chivalrous doctor, having faced death, is devoted to carrying on his father's humanitarian spirit of helping the world. Educated in the West yet passionate about Chinese traditions, he provides free treatment to one patient after another abandoned by Western medicine.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2632
programme.desc: Hung Shu-Kan owns a logistics business. The only thing on his mind is the well-being of his three daughters. His eldest daughter has moved abroad, but his second youngest daughter, Yuek-Shui, is still single. She and her little sister Sum-Yue often squabble, putting their father in a dilemma.

programme.title: Scoop 2025
programme.desc: This programme goes hot on the heels of the biggest happenings in society and the entertainment scene, bringing you the latest scoops.

programme.title: Gourmet Express
programme.desc: Hong Kong is home to gourmet food from all over the world. Our food anchors and hosts keep up with the latest foodie information and offers, gaining an in-depth understanding of the stories behind the taste.

programme.title: Legend of Two Sisters in the Chaos - EP 13
programme.desc: During the Later Zhou dynasty, the Fu family becomes the focus of attention when a prophecy states that one of their daughters will become empress. This leads to people assuming that by destroying the Fu sisters, they will also destroy the throne.

programme.title: Big City Shop 2024
programme.desc: Big City Shop introduces viewers to the latest products on fashion, skin care, make-up, health care, baby care and much more! The hosts will demonstrate and try on the products, and also invite related experts to share their knowledge.

programme.title: Happy Old Buddies
programme.desc: This show brings on doctors and Chinese medicine practitioners to discuss diseases that the elderly should pay attention to, and provide prevention and treatment methods.

programme.title: News Treasury 2024
programme.desc: News Treasury takes everyone to uncover news from the treasure house. In addition to past specials, live broadcasts and reports, there are also precious clips from iconic events that have never been exposed.

programme.title: Romeo and His Butterfly Lover - EP 22
programme.desc: The story retells the classic tragic love stories between the butterfly lovers as well as Romeo and Juliet in a new-age modern take.

programme.title: Romeo and His Butterfly Lover - EP 23
programme.desc: The story retells the classic tragic love stories between the butterfly lovers as well as Romeo and Juliet in a new-age modern take.

programme.title: Vengeance of the Bride - EP 1
programme.desc: Eun Seo Yeon is not rich, but everyone knows she has a warm heart. One day, she discovers that the man, Kang Baek San, whom she calls 'father' is actually her real parents' enemy! She embarks on a revenge journey...

programme.title: Vengeance of the Bride - EP 2
programme.desc: Eun Seo Yeon is not rich, but everyone knows she has a warm heart. One day, she discovers that the man, Kang Baek San, whom she calls 'father' is actually her real parents' enemy! She embarks on a revenge journey...

programme.title: Serendipity - EP 14
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Jian Mingshu (Lu Yuxiao) loses her memory after falling off a cliff, which saves her from a massacre. Rescued by her love interest Lu Chang (Wang Ziqi), they journey to the capital for imperial exams. Facing challenges together, they fall in love.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2029
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: Anonymous Signal - EP 26
programme.desc: Three police rookies and a senior develop a tight relationship until they parted ways due to an operation. Mysterious text messages that can't be scientifically explained are being sent to them following a dismemberment murder of a young girl. Who sent them?

programme.title: Coroner's Diary - EP 1
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Qin Wan (Landy Li), the daughter of the minister of Dali Temple, relied on her superb medical and forensic skills to join hands with Prince Yan Chi (Ao Rui Peng) to solve unsolved cases and find the real culprit in order to vindicate her father.

programme.desc: Set in the 60s in Jioufen, the story tells how three sworn brothers conquer the world with their bare hands. While connecting romance from the previous generation to the shared emotions with the present, the drama explores differences in generational values.

programme.desc: This drama tells various entanglements of romantic relationships - violence and tenderness; ugliness and beauty; sadism and healing; reality and romance. Through four parts, the drama explores situations and questions that many have experienced.

programme.title: Road To Eternity - EP 6
programme.desc: The Envoy of Wisdom sympathised with mankind in their affliction, he swore to save all living beings before becoming a Buddha. He had transmigration of his soul into human being and named as HUI TAK (Lam Ka Tung)._x000D__x000D_TAK was very clever but aloof from fame and wealth. He admired a famous doctor’s granddaughter FUNG (Chan Miu Ying) and they were intimate to each other. On the other hand, PRINCESS MAN SHUI (Tong Ying Ying) liked TAK very much because of his intelligence.

programme.title: Angels of Mission - EP 15
programme.desc: The Police Counter-Terrorism Unit (CTU) gathers intelligence to fight against terrorist attacks. Three beautiful female officers, SAM (KWOK SONIJA), FA (SHEH CHARMAINE) and BO BO (YEUNG SZE KI, SHIRLEY), who have different personalities, are outstanding members of this unit._x000D_ _x000D_ SAM is a Chief Inspector in CTU. She is decisive and never mixes personal matters with work. FA is good at martial arts and enthusiastic in her job. However, she can be very short-tempered.

programme.title: Brutally Young 2.0 - EP 16
programme.desc: Since starting out more than a decade ago, painter Yiu Sheung-him (Shaun Tam) has not much luck until gallery boss Fong Chi-ho (Joel Chan) and his wife Sung Wai-kei (Candice Chiu) discover an old painting created by Sheung-him 18 years ago. And the couple decide to help him become famous, but Sheung-him is simply not in the mood to feel happy. A moment of vanity causes Sheung-him to forgo his principles which he has been steadfastly following.

programme.title: Pillow Case Of Mystery, A - EP 1
programme.desc: SZE SAI LUN (Au Yeung Chun Wah, Bobby), the magistrate of Jiangdu County once makes a mistake, making an innocent person taking its own life by hanging. Since then, LUN loses his faith in himself and his will is down. Later by chance, LUN obtains a Dream-pillow. Whenever he comes across any difficult cases, the Pillow-spirit (Lo Hoi Pang) will appear in his dream and present him the puzzle that holds the key to crack the case.

programme.title: Heart Of Greed - EP 15
programme.desc: An abalone that has been passed on for generations_x000D_A legacy of hundred million dollars that everybody wants a share_x000D__x000D__x000D_It is a story of a renowned sea-products retailer and a big traditional family, in which there are those who manage to endure to the end, those who consider themselves superior to everyone else, those who love and respect their brothers, those who seek every opportunity to fulfill their ambition, those who stay loyal to their beloved,

On the other hand, PRINCESS MAN SHUI (Tong Ying Ying) liked TAK very much because of his intelligence.

programme.title: Angels of Mission - EP 17
programme.desc: The Police Counter-Terrorism Unit (CTU) gathers intelligence to fight against terrorist attacks. Three beautiful female officers, SAM (KWOK SONIJA), FA (SHEH CHARMAINE) and BO BO (YEUNG SZE KI, SHIRLEY), who have different personalities, are outstanding members of this unit._x000D_ _x000D_ SAM is a Chief Inspector in CTU. She is decisive and never mixes personal matters with work. FA is good at martial arts and enthusiastic in her job. However, she can be very short-tempered.

programme.title: Brutally Young 2.0 - EP 18
programme.desc: Since starting out more than a decade ago, painter Yiu Sheung-him (Shaun Tam) has not much luck until gallery boss Fong Chi-ho (Joel Chan) and his wife Sung Wai-kei (Candice Chiu) discover an old painting created by Sheung-him 18 years ago. And the couple decide to help him become famous, but Sheung-him is simply not in the mood to feel happy. A moment of vanity causes Sheung-him to forgo his principles which he has been steadfastly following.

programme.title: Pillow Case Of Mystery, A - EP 3
programme.desc: SZE SAI LUN (Au Yeung Chun Wah, Bobby), the magistrate of Jiangdu County once makes a mistake, making an innocent person taking its own life by hanging. Since then, LUN loses his faith in himself and his will is down. Later by chance, LUN obtains a Dream-pillow. Whenever he comes across any difficult cases, the Pillow-spirit (Lo Hoi Pang) will appear in his dream and present him the puzzle that holds the key to crack the case.

programme.title: Heart Of Greed - EP 19
programme.desc: An abalone that has been passed on for generations_x000D_A legacy of hundred million dollars that everybody wants a share_x000D__x000D__x000D_It is a story of a renowned sea-products retailer and a big traditional family, in which there are those who manage to endure to the end, those who consider themselves superior to everyone else, those who love and respect their brothers, those who seek every opportunity to fulfill their ambition, those who stay loyal to their beloved,

programme.title: Heart Of Greed - EP 20
programme.desc: An abalone that has been passed on for generations_x000D_A legacy of hundred million dollars that everybody wants a share_x000D__x000D__x000D_It is a story of a renowned sea-products retailer and a big traditional family, in which there are those who manage to endure to the end, those who consider themselves superior to everyone else, those who love and respect their brothers, those who seek every opportunity to fulfill their ambition, those who stay loyal to their beloved,

programme.title: Law Or Justice
programme.desc: Lawyer Yip defends a rapist and gets him acquitted. Yip's boyfriend Fong, a police inspector, knows he is guilty and despises Yip for not upholding justice. The victim's sister takes revenge by spiking the rapist's drink but is raped instead. This puts the rapist back in court. Will Yip choose to uphold law or justice this time?

programme.title: Let's Have a Baby
programme.desc: De Sheng and Wan Jun have been married for years, but are unable to conceive. Wan Jun decides to undergo artificial insemination in the States and finally gets pregnant. She meets her cousin from the States who stays temporarily in their house with them, and De Sheng begins to suspect that they are having an affair...

programme.title: Kung Fu Mahjong 3
programme.desc: Gambling tycoon Man suddenly marries his new partner Sophie, which shocked his only son, Ken. In the wake of Man's heart attack, Ken must battle Sophie - who has persuaded Man to transfer his grand master title to her in the event of his death - for the rightful claim to the family's gambling business in a riveting game of mahjong.

programme.title: PTU
programme.desc: When OCTB (Organized Crime And Triad Bureau) officer, Sergeant Lo Sa, loses his police revolver to four triad young thugs, he seeks help from Sergeant Mike Ho of the PTU (Police Tactical Unit) to find his lost revolver. Ho and his patrolling PTU team has until dawn to recover the gun and clean up the mess.

programme.title: Hong Kong Hong Kong
programme.desc: After moving to Hong Kong, illegal immigrant Mang has no choice but to live in cramped quarters with male migrants who abuse her. In order to attain Hong Kong residency and a better life, she agrees to marry a lonely old carpenter. After her marriage, Mang crosses paths again with her ex-lover, and the two develop a passionate affair...

programme.title: The Eye 2
programme.desc: Joey looks to start a new life after a failed suicide attempt but finds herself pregnant and dare not tell her ex-boyfriend. At the same time, she realizes that a mysterious woman is stalking her and begins to hallucinate, leading to a nervous breakdown. Taking advice from an abbot, Joey decides to uncover the truth in order to protect her baby...

programme.title: Don't Open Your Eyes
programme.desc: A cop has the ability to see ghosts, which is something that has been passed down from generation to generation in his family. He must learn how to manage this gift when he is confronted by the ghost of a notorious criminal whom he has shot.

programme.title: All's Well End's Well 97
programme.desc: Mr Lo has three sons, Leung, Fay and Kung; and a daughter-in-law, Eliza. While they seem like a normal family, their relationships need mending. Leung and Fay play a prank on their brother Kung on his birthday by falsely claiming that he has won the lottery. This sets off a chain reaction of funny mishaps that finally brings the family together.

programme.title: Perfect Girls
programme.desc: Chi will inherit his dying grandfather's fortune with one condition - he has to be married in a month, otherwise the money goes to his uncle, Robert. Chi falls in love with Siu Siu, but Robert intends to stop them by sending Moraine to seduce Chi. When Moraine decides to marry Chi for money, Robert stops her and reveals their plot.

programme.title: The Flying Mr. B
programme.desc: Mr. Shi, a secondary PE teacher, accidentally takes a "super pill" invented by the science teacher and gains superpower, turning into Mr. B. He uses his superpower to help the school sports team win the championship and prevent crimes. When the triad is made aware of Mr. B's superpower, they try to gain the super pill for nefarious purposes.

programme.title: The Phantom Lover
programme.desc: In 1926 China, Sung, a talented singer, is deeply in love with To, a sweet innocent girl from a wealthy family. Their love evokes strong disapproval from To's father and bitter jealousy from her designated fiance, a young man chosen by her family. This is a story about a singer and a wealthy girl battling to be together in a traditional community.

programme.title: Love and Let Love!
programme.desc: Cliff proposes to his girlfriend Terry but is killed in a car accident before she says "yes". Terry is devastated and inconsolable. When Cliff's ghost returns, they seem to go back to their good old days. However, Cliff is determined to help Terry get over his death and start anew.

programme.title: Model from Hell
programme.desc: Anna, an exceptional student in a modelling school, becomes the target of envy from fellow models, who all die mysteriously when they want to harm her. It turns out that when Anna is upset, she undergoes a terrifying transformation and can wield lethal psychic power...

programme.title: 97 Aces Go Places
programme.desc: Hao Shi becomes the new triad boss after his father is killed by the pretty swindler, Ling. While professional gunman Drunken Gun is tasked to help Hao Shi take revenge, Ling is hunted by gangster Lei, from whom she has conned 2 million dollars. In the process, Hao Shi and Drunken Gun accidentally arrest Lei instead...

programme.title: How to Pick Girls Up !
programme.desc: Xin, a helpless loser in love, calls in to a radio show hosted by DJ Tsang to ask desperately for help. A self-proclaimed love expert, Tsang takes it upon himself to make sure Xin meets girls and leads him on a series of absurd excursions into the wild and dangerous world of modern love.

programme.title: Kung Fu Mahjong 2
programme.desc: Fanny appears to be an ordinary housewife but is in fact a mahjong expert. Deeply in love with her husband, she loses to a seductive woman, Curvy, both on the mahjong table and in competing for her husband's love. With the help from her mahjong master, Fanny vows to take on Curvy in the Mahjong King tournament!

programme.title: Ninth Happiness
programme.desc: A comedy starring many popular movie stars, this is a story about a magistrate and his brothers aiming to introduce sin and romance into the virtuous community of Rainbow Village. As they vie for the affections of a charming young village maiden, conflicts arise, adding a twist to their mischievous endeavours.

programme.title: Bullet and Brain
programme.desc: Nine years ago, two legendary criminals, Bullet and Brain, vowed not to kill and lie before they disappeared. Both now return for a mission - to protect the granddaughter of the triad boss. Can they succeed without breaking their vows?

programme.title: Mahjong Heroes
programme.desc: A hero helps a young student deflect a cunning and malicious gambling tycoon who is out to take over the student's family business over a game of mahjong.

programme.title: God of Gambler's Return
programme.desc: The God of Gamblers, Gao Jin, quits gambling and live a quiet life with his wife. However, a Taiwanese crime boss wants to become the new God of Gamblers and get rid of him, so he kills Gao Jin's pregnant wife to force him to the casino table. Gao Jin is indignant and vows to fight the crime boss to avenge his wife's death.

programme.title: Mr. Virgin
programme.desc: Mr. Virgin is a romantic comedy about a twenty-nine year-old man Chao Yu-ting (Alfred Chang) who has seemingly been cursed. He becomes paranoid when a Feng Shui expert tells him it will be unlucky for him to marry before the age of thirty... so comical chaos line the days up to his next birthday!

programme.title: The Story of Woo Viet
programme.desc: Former Vietnamese veteran Woo Viet arrives a refugee camp in Hong Kong and meets his pen pal Quan. Subsequently, he encounters Shum Ching, with whom he attempts to flee to the US. However, the pair end up stranded in Manila's Chinatown, where at the hands of the local triads Woo becomes a hired killer, while Shum is forced into prostitution.

programme.title: Women
programme.desc: Bo Yi's husband is having an affair, so Bo Yi divorces him and joins the "Happy Spinsters Club" set up by her friends. However, she soon finds out that she does not enjoy being single and while sorting out her thoughts, her repentant husband begs her forgiveness. She must now decide on what she truly wants.

programme.title: Man Wanted 3
programme.desc: Street kid Dong idolizes Mongkok triad leader Pu Jun and inadvertently joins his gang. When rival Xi Yang seizes control by illicit means, Pu Jun decides to take him down. At the same time, Pu Jun uncovers Dong as a police undercover and banishes him, but Dong sheds his undercover identity to join Pu Jun to seek revenge against Xi Yang.

programme.title: Maybe It's Love
programme.desc: A girl Marble witnesses a murder case and reports it to the police. After much investigation, the police can only sort out the complicated relationships between a rich merchant's mistress, a postman, a shop owner and his wife, but find no clue as to who the murderer is. Therefore, Marble decides to carry out her own investigation...

programme.title: Romantic Dream
programme.desc: Dino meets his dream girl Mandy and falls in love with her at first sight. However, she disappears suddenly and he only sees her again after nine years, when she is already married. To overcome the pain of losing his love, Dino finds a guru with supernatural power to make him meet Mandy in his dream.

programme.title: The Bride With White Hair
programme.desc: As Wudang disciple Zhuo Yi Hang confronts the Demon Palace, he reunites with Lian Ni Shang, the woman who once saved him, and their love reignites. Lian, a disciple of the Demon Palace, endures torment to be with Zhuo but is shattered when he accidentally injures her. A fierce battle between good and evil unfolds!

programme.title: The Eye 10
programme.desc: This third installment of 'The Eye' horror movie series is about the creepy adventures of a group of teenagers who summon spirits by using the ten methods outlined in a mysterious comic book while vacationing in Thailand.

programme.title: All's Well End's Well Too
programme.desc: Another super comedy directed by Clifton Ko about more farcical couplings, mistaken identities, infidelities, and arranged marriages set in the Sung Dynasty.

programme.title: Teenage Dreamers
programme.desc: Ting Ting is a student in an all-girl high school. She tries out for the school's stage production of Romeo and Juliet with an all-boy school and promptly falls for the lead, Jackson. While Ting Ting is swept away by the excitement of her first love, Jackson turns out to be more of a player than a partner.

programme.title: Find Your Voice
programme.desc: The "passion choir pilot program" trains students from three underperforming schools' choir to participate in an inter-school choral competition. While it seems impossible, a renowned conductor, Yim Tsz Long, unexpectedly agrees to lead the choir. Will the "passion choir" and Maestro Yim complete this impossible mission and win the competition?

programme.title: Ambitious Kung Fu Girl
programme.desc: The lovely Michelle Mei Suet plays a spoiled girl Szu-szu who ignores her true love Yang Fan to go off in search of a swordsman Chin Ko she idolizes. The search sets off one great action scene after another, until she's threatened to be sold into slavery but Yang Fan arrives in the nick of time! This amusing and entertaining variation on the standard kung-fu film is definitely a winner.

programme.title: Lady General Hua Mu-Lan
programme.desc: Mulan disguises herself as a male soldier to replace her aged father in a war against the barbarians. Her courage brings her victory in battles and she was promoted to a general. When Mulan returns home with glory, the chief commander asks her to marry his daughter, forcing Mulan to reveal her true identity.

programme.title: Killer Constable
programme.desc: Kuei Chih-hung was famous for his modern day crime thrillers, his horror flicks, and even his comedies. But if the only kung-fu film he ever made was this one, he'd still be spoken of with respect by even the most ardent martial arts movie fan. Many consider this real life martial arts champion Chen Kuan-tai's best performance. As a deeply, even obsessively, dedicated Chief Court Constable, he illuminates the screen with fighting skill and emotional passion.

programme.title: Melody of Love
programme.desc: Three young doctors pursue three hard-to-get beauties in this romantic film set in the 70s "a-go-go" era. They have no idea where to start and use Rock-paper-scissor method to match themselves with the girls. The tactics and tricks they use are hilarious and they have to reshuffle their plans when nothing leads to success!

programme.title: Song Of Orchid Island
programme.desc: Dr. He moves to the remote Lanyu island off the coast of Taiwan to look for his long lost father, and starts to run a clinic curing islanders who are bitten by the fatal red worms there. He meets Ya Lan who works as a nurse in his clinic and falls in love with him. Things get vicious for Dr. He as a jealous islander plots to get rid of him...

programme.title: Holy Flame of the Martial World
programme.desc: This internationally popular tale of a brother and sister, seeking vengeance for the death of their parents through using the mythical yin/yang Holy Flame kung-fu technique. It's an outstanding epic choreographed and co-starring lead "Venom" Kuo Chue (aka. Philip Kwok).

programme.title: The Love Eterne
programme.desc: Ying Tai disguises herself as a boy to go to school and falls hopelessly in love with her classmate, Shan Bo. After Shan Bo realizes her true identity, he proposes marriage to Ying Tai. However, they are kept apart as she is engaged to another man. Knowing Shan Bo died in despair, Ying Tai is in deep sorrow and kills herself at his grave.

programme.title: The Naval Commandos
programme.desc: The Chinese Navy is attempting to defend its coastline from a Japanese attack, they send their commando unit led by Cui Hsia into the mainland to enlist help to thwart the Japanese before they attack. The commandos enlist the help of Song San and Shiao Liu to kill the Japanese officers led by Shan Mao and destroy their attacking ships.

programme.title: The Magnificent Concubine
programme.desc: Yang Gui Fei is the beloved concubine of Emperor Tang Ming Huang, who is so besotted with her that he leaves the running of the country to Prime Minister Yang Guo Zhong, the brother of Yang Gui Fei. The Prime Minister is corrupt and cruel to the army, causing them to revolt and endanger the throne. Yang Gui Fei is also implicated and kills herself.

programme.title: Rivals of Kung Fu
programme.desc: As Shen and Wong Fei Hung's relationship turns sour, Shen frames Wong and his disciple for murder. They are saved by a businessman Zhou, but Wong must win the Lion Dance Trophy to return Zhou's favour. Can Wong Fei Hung defeat all skilled martial artists and complete his mission?

programme.title: The Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: This side-splitting comedy sees naive Ah Niu headed to Hong Kong, where he is repeatedly exploited and taken advantage of, and eventually finds himself arrested and imprisoned! Can he survive difficult times and finally overcome adversity?

programme.title: Gang Master
programme.desc: This is a story about an army out to destroy the Hsien Lung gang of anti-Yuan revolutionaries. Their leader Ru Yi Tu is up against Fu Zhong Yuan, the identified successor of the Hsien Lung gang who must also prove his own legitimacy. The plot thickens with murder, sibling rivalry and shocking discoveries that could change the course of history.

programme.title: The 82 Tenants
programme.desc: Continuing the success of the classic comedy "House of 72 tenants", this sequel tells the stories of tenants living in an old building in Hong Kong who are forced to evict by the developers. Some tenants prefer to take the compensation while some resist the move. Will the acquisitions plan destroy the harmony of the neighborhood?

programme.title: The Anonymous Heroes
programme.desc: In this action comedy, two young men join a rebel group after the Chinese Revolution of 1911 and accidentally become patriotic heroes. Assisted by a warlord's daughter, they successfully help the rebels steal weapons from the warlord.

programme.title: Black Magic
programme.desc: Hsu Lo is up against an evil black magic practitioner San Kan Mi, who wants to place a death spell on him and a love spell on his fiancee Wang Chu Ying. Fortunately, Wang's friends manage to find another veteran witch doctor to take on the evil San. This bone-chilling tale of good versus evil races to a heart-stopping ending.

programme.title: Disciples of the 36th Chamber
programme.desc: In the finale of this trilogy, Gordon Liu reprises his famous role, Monk San Te, as he tries to protect Fang Shih Yu, an arrogant youth who gets into trouble with the Qing officials, and nearly lands Shaolin Temple into trouble too.

programme.title: Hell Has No Boundary
programme.desc: Cheng Chung (Derek Yee) and May (Liu Hsueh-hua), a pair of lovers working on the police force, camp on an outlying island. Awakened by a strange sound, May goes out onto the beach where a violent frenzy grips her. After her return from leave, May insists Inspector Wang (Yueh Hua) in a bid to rescue some hostages. She shoots the thug under most peculiar circumstances. Then a series of tragedies occur.

programme.title: Return of the One-armed Swordsman
programme.desc: One-armed Swordsman Fang Kang wants to lead a quiet life with his wife, but when she is abducted by the Eight Demon Swordsmen clan, he is forced to take them on in order to save her.

programme.title: Lion VS Lion
programme.desc: The traditional lion dance has never looked so good as in Lion VS Lion which captures the most impressive sequences of lion dancing on film. Besides being loaded with enjoyable martial arts chicanery, film historians can revel because it's also the first film that clearly demonstrates the intricacies and differences between the traditional Northern and Southern lion dancing techniques.

programme.title: The Pure and the Evil
programme.desc: Two teen girls, Rose and May, become close friends despite their different social backgrounds. The rich girl May moves to America but returns years later to see Rose, now a beauty queen and bar girl. Rose is immediately attracted to Fang's fiance and their relationship quickly deteriorates when Rose sets out to pursue him...

programme.title: The Hidden Power Of Dragon Sabre
programme.desc: Defeated villain Sung Ching Shu returns and starts a reign of terror, trapping a beautiful Mongolian Princess and mastering the "yin and yang combination" to become almost invincible. Only two swords held by two great swordsmen can stand in his way!

programme.title: Love without End
programme.desc: Singer Qing Qing and architect Peng Nan are a devoted couple. Qing Qing sacrifices herself to help Peng Nan when his family is going through difficulties and is misunderstood by Peng Nan, leading to their break up. When Peng Nan learns the truth and decides to make up with Qing Qing, he finds out that she is suffering from a terminal illness.

programme.title: Police Force
programme.desc: A man joins the Hong Kong police force to track down a murderer who has killed his friend in a robbery. While he struggles to reconcile his law defending police duty with his desire for vengeance, he also has a new-found respect for the law.

programme.title: Beyond the Great Wall
programme.desc: Wang Zhao Jun refuses to bribe the imperial painter, so he draws an ugly portrait of her, preventing her from being selected by the Emperor until they meet in person. The painter ends up in exile and plots for Wang to marry the Hun's warlord as a revenge. The Emperor rejects this, provoking a war which is only averted when Wang sacrifices herself.

programme.title: The Eight Diagram Pole Fighter
programme.desc: The Yang Generals were ambushed by the enemies and only two of the sons survived. The fifth son of Yang's escapes to Shaolin temple and learns the pole-fighting techniques from the monks, eventually creating his own "Eight Diagram Pole Fight" and teaming up with the Shaolin monks to avenge his family.

programme.title: Carry on Doctors and Nurses
programme.desc: At St. Morant Hospital, a harried but lovely administrator must deal with lusty interns, student nurses, a delirious surgeon, a dissection fiend, a criticizing Commissioner and gross negligence at regular intervals! This comedy is based on the hugely successful British Carry On! film series.

programme.title: The Deadly Duo
programme.desc: The prince of the Sung Dynasty is captured by the Chin invaders and guarded by top martial arts masters. Two powerful patriots need to fight the overwhelming odds and pull off the impossible: to rescue the royal Prince and get out of the Chin stronghold alive.

programme.title: Disco Bumpkins
programme.desc: This musical comedy is about how a young man Fen, along with his buddy Hamburger, finds love and success in the advertising world.

programme.title: The Bully
programme.desc: For lovers of the Shaw's sumptuous production and martial arts expertise, this action adventure in the "Jackie Chan style" is a special treat. A persecuted waiter turns to a "drunken master" for help when a restaurant customer turns out to be a kung-fu harbinger of doom!

programme.title: Shao Kang's War Room
programme.desc: Shao Kang's War Room is a Talkshow hosted by Zhao Shao Kang. This programme combines TVBS News source and Mr. Zhao's rich political and media background, to analyse important news deeply.

programme.title: Global Golden Line
programme.desc: It is the first professional reality car show, providing concrete evaluations of cars on the market, the deepest appreciation for classic cars, the hottest trends in the motoring world, and analysis of the latest auto tech trends.

programme.title: Chop Chop Show
programme.desc: The show invites younger generations to talk about relationship, career, entertainment, current affairs, and all the other popular topics that they care and complain about.

programme.title: Citizens' Subjects
programme.desc: Citizens' Subjects utilizes the perspective of Taiwan people and Taiwan events to tell the stories of Taiwan. It takes a light-hearted, humorous approach to interpreting current affairs.

programme.title: Queen
programme.desc: From makeup, skincare, hairstyle, clothing, horoscopes, parenting, to travel, all kinds of fashion-related topics are presented in the program. Pauline Lan leads dozens of professionals and experts across categories to offer the best fashion insights and tips.

programme.title: Global Focus
programme.desc: Bringing you the latest political, economy, information technology and breaking news around the world.

programme.title: All About Health
programme.desc: How well do you know your body? What should you eat to be healthy and energetic? Are health tips available online reliable? Tune in to this programme as the hosts give you all the answers!

programme.title: Halo World Snooker Championship 2025
programme.desc: The 2025 World Snooker Championship is a professional snooker tournament organised by the World Snooker Tour and will take place at the Crucible Theatre in Sheffield, England. The winner will receive £500,000 from a total prize fund of £2,395,000. Kyren Wilson is the defending champion and will attempt to to overcome the so-called "Crucible curse", under which no first-time champion has retained the title since the tournament moved to the Crucible Theatre in 1977.
